meanings.definition: A meeting in which information is given or instructions are explained.
meanings.sent1: During the briefing, the boss told us about the new project.
meanings.sent2: I attended a briefing about the upcoming changes in company policy.
meanings.sent3: At the briefing, everyone was surprised to learn about the unexpected bonus.
meanings.sent4: The briefing was like a map guiding us through the complex project.
meanings.sent5: The briefing felt like a flashlight illuminating the path ahead.

meanings.sent1: She provided a briefing of the main points discussed in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The student gave a briefing of the book in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent3: His briefing was so short that it left everyone wanting more details.
meanings.sent4: The briefing was like a trailer for the full movie of information.
meanings.sent5: The briefing was a snapshot capturing the essence of the topic.
